parameter.description: Sent if VForce Data has already been extracted
parameter.name: in_VForceData

parameter.description: Sent if VForce Data has not yet been extracted
parameter.name: in_OpportunityID

operation.expression: let $VF := $temp.tmp_VForceData , $VFa := $VF/Account[1], $VFo := $VF/OpportunityHeader[1] return <VForceData xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.informatica.com/spi/types/2013/12/spi-interface/" xmlns:ns3="http://schemas.active-endpoints.com/appmodules/screenflow/2011/07/avosCommon.xsd" xmlns:ns4="http://schemas.active-endpoints.com/appmodules/screenflow/2010/10/avosScreenflow.xsd" xmlns:type="http://schemas.informatica.com/spi/types/2013/12/spi-interface/"> {$VFa} {$VFo} {for $VFp in $VF/OpportunityProductDetails return if ( (switch ($VFp/OpportunityProduct_ID) case "FirstTimeCustomerDefault1" return $output.out_CustDefaultProduct1_Exists case "FirstTimeCustomerDefault2" return $output.out_CustDefaultProduct2_Exists case "FirstTimeCustomerDefault3" return $output.out_CustDefaultProduct3_Exists case "FirstTimeCustomerDefault4" return $output.out_CustDefaultProduct4_Exists default return 0 ) !=1) then ($VFp) else () } </VForceData>

<to_CustProjSlsOrdItem xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data">
{for $Pdt at $i in $output.VF_SemiStructured_ALL3[1]/OpportunityProductDetails[OpportunityProduct_ProductCode != ''] let $itemCat := switch ($Pdt/Product2_Custom_Pricing_Method ) (:PS01=Fixed Price; PS02=Time & Expenses; PS06=Periodic Service; PS07=Usage Based:) case "Block" return "PS07" case "Default Product" return "PS02" case "List" return switch ($Pdt/ItemCategory) case "PFP" return "PS01" case "PTE" return "PS02" case "PPS" return "PS06" default return "PS06" default return "PS06" (:,$itemCatS := util:iif($itemCat!="PS07", $Pdt/ItemCategory, ''):) ,$itemCatS := util:iif($itemCat!="PS07", $Pdt/ItemCategory, 'PTE') (:,$ProdBase := util:iif($itemCat!="PS07", fn:replace($Pdt/OpportunityProduct_ProductCode/text(),'-',''), 'U003'):) ,$ProdBase := fn:replace($Pdt/OpportunityProduct_ProductCode/text(),'-','') ,$ProfitC := switch(fn:substring($ProdBase ,1,4)) case "GRES" return "8110" case "GRSC" return "8120" case "GRRC" return "8130" case "ADTX" return "8210" case "ADLG" return "8220" case "ADPE" return "8230" case "ADWE" return "8240" case "FAFR" return "8310" case "FAPP" return "8320" case "FAAM" return "8330" default return ""
return <results m:isArray="true"> <SalesOrderItem>{fn:format-number($i*10,"00000")}</SalesOrderItem> <SalesOrderItemCategory>{$itemCat}</SalesOrderItemCategory> <Material>{$ProdBase||$itemCatS}</Material> <SalesOrderItemText>{fn:substring($Pdt/Product2_Description/text(),1,40)}</SalesOrderItemText> <ProfitCenter>{$ProfitC}</ProfitCenter> <TransactionCurrency>{$input.in_ProjectCurrency }</TransactionCurrency> <!--MaterialByCustomer></MaterialByCustomer--> <ExpectedNetAmount>{fn:format-number($Pdt/CalcTotal, '#0.##')}</ExpectedNetAmount>
<to_CustProjSOIBillgPlnItm> {for $BPI at $ii in $Pdt/BillingPlan return <results m:isArray="true"> <BillingPlanItem>{$ii}</BillingPlanItem>
{if ($itemCat = "PS01" or $itemCat = "PS02" or $itemCat = "PS06" or $itemCat = "PS07") then ( <BillingPlanBillingDate>{"/Date("||date:dateToMillis($BPI/BillingPlanBillingDate)||")/"}</BillingPlanBillingDate>) else ()}
{if ($itemCat = "PS01" or $itemCat = "PS06") then ( <BillingPlanAmount>{fn:format-number($BPI/BillingPlanAmount,'#0.##') }</BillingPlanAmount>) else ()}
{if ($itemCat = "PS01" or $itemCat = "PS02" or $itemCat = "PS06" or $itemCat = "PS07") then ( <TransactionCurrency>{$input.in_ProjectCurrency }</TransactionCurrency>) else ()}
{if ($itemCat = "PS07") then ( $BPI/BillingPlanItemUsage) else ()}
{if ($itemCat = "PS01" or $itemCat = "PS06") then ( <BillingPlanItemDescription>{$BPI/BillingPlanItemDescription/text()||" - "||$Pdt/OpportunityProduct_CountryIsoCode/text()}</BillingPlanItemDescription>) else ()}
{if ($itemCat = "PS06") then ( <BillingPlanServiceStartDate>{"/Date("||date:dateToMillis($BPI/BillingPlanServiceStartDate)||")/"}</BillingPlanServiceStartDate>) else ()} {if ($itemCat = "PS06") then ( <BillingPlanServiceEndDate>{"/Date("||date:dateToMillis($BPI/BillingPlanServiceEndDate)||")/"}</BillingPlanServiceEndDate>) else ()} </results> } </to_CustProjSOIBillgPlnItm> <to_CustProjSlsOrdItemWorkPckg> <results m:isArray="true"> <WorkPackage>{$input.in_ProjectID||".1."||$i }</WorkPackage> </results> </to_CustProjSlsOrdItemWorkPckg> </results>} </to_CustProjSlsOrdItem>

parameter.name: reason
parameter.expression: "Input must be either 18-digit Opportunity ID (provided as["|| $input.in_OpportunityID ||"]) or pre-extracted VForce Data (not set)"
